Name: Renaming one thoroughfare in the Borough of Queens, The Live End, and to amend the official map of the city of New York accordingly.
Title: A Local Law in relation to renaming one thoroughfare in the Borough of Queens, The Live End, and to amend the official map of the city of New York accordingly

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation

Summary: This bill would officially rename a portion of a street located on Murdock Avenue between 180th Street and a dead end in Jamaica, Queens to “the Live End.”
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. The following street name, in the Borough of Queens, is hereby renamed as hereafter indicated.

New Name
Present Name
Limits
The Live End
Murdock Avenue
Between 180th Street and the dead end of the block

      �2. The official map of the city of New York shall be amended in accordance with the provisions of section one of this local law.
	�3. This local law shall take effect immediately.




KS
LS # 18443
1/16/25
